fields.original_string: private static final Coordinate DEFAULT_Z = new CoordinateEd25519(BigInteger.ONE);
private static final Coordinate ONE = new CoordinateEd25519(BigInteger.ONE);
private static final Coordinate ZERO = new CoordinateEd25519(BigInteger.ZERO);
static final PointEd25519 O = new PointEd25519(ZERO, ONE, DEFAULT_Z, ZERO);
fields.declarator: O = new PointEd25519(ZERO, ONE, DEFAULT_Z, ZERO)

fields.original_string: private static final Curve curve = Curve25519.getInstance();

methods.parameters: (Coordinate x, Coordinate y, Coordinate z, Coordinate t)
methods.signature: PointEd25519(Coordinate x, Coordinate y, Coordinate z, Coordinate t)
